name: Lucid: Level Pack
description:
This game is of considerably higher difficulty than the base game, and it’s recommended you have played ‘Lucid: Parables of the Ubermensch' first before trying out the level pack. You can find it linked below.

Most modern controllers supported.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1574200/Lucid_Parables_of_the_Ubermensch/

You loved Lucid. We all loved it, and you have an all-consuming desire to play more of it. That’s where this level pack comes in. Three levels, where you have to run through the cruel, abstract worlds of the YouTubers who supported ‘Lucid: Parables of the Ubermensch’ during its initial release. 

Support Magemasher22, Students of Gaming, and Gashat-Gaming on their YouTube pages!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tKKdZEKWbuE&t=117s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GOysjQQUtAs&t=2031s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JAxIkbH9m2U&t=1664s
